src.description: webview links to web pages. You can open the article of the associated Official Account, and other web pages need to log in to the Mini Program management background to configure the business domain name.
src.description_zh: webview 指向网页的链接。可打开关联的公众号的文章，其它网页需登录小程序管理后台配置业务域名。

progressbarColor.description: The color of the progress bar for the webview

type.description: If you use the web-view component to introduce a third-party customer service, you must enter type="im"
type.description_zh: 若使用web-view组件引入第三方客服，必须填写type="im"

onMessage.description: When a web page sends a postMessage to a Mini Program, a message will be triggered and received at a specific time (Mini Program rewinds, components are destroyed, and shared). e.detail = { data }
onMessage.description_zh: 网页向小程序 postMessage 时，会在特定时机（小程序后退、组件销毁、分享）触发并收到消息。e.detail = { data }

onLoad.description: This event is triggered when the page loads successfully. e.detail = { src }
onLoad.description_zh: 网页加载成功时候触发此事件。e.detail = { src }

onError.description: This event is triggered when a web page fails to load. e.detail = { src }
onError.description_zh: 网页加载失败的时候触发此事件。e.detail = { src }
